Added link to Axis website and Wiki.

author: rkellogg

author: dims
msg: Fix for Bug 14636 - SOAPAction MIME header set through SAAJ not being passed on

author: dims
msg: Fix for Bug 21510 - call timeout when using SAAJ
SOAPConnectionImpl exposes timeout. So you can typecast SOAPConnection to SOAPConnectionImpl and use the set/get timeout methods.
